data: PODSURG Podiatry Post Operative Pain and Symptom Management
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Do not initiate this PowerPlan if Acute Pain Service (APS), Perioperative Pain Service (POPS) or Anesthesiology is following this patient
Patient Care
Order for Duplicate Checking, do not modify
Medications
acetaminophen PRN range dose
dose range: 650 to 975 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
acetaminophen
650 mg, rectal, q6h, PRN pain, drug form: supp
Ibuprofen is contraindicated if eGFR less than 30 mL/min or allergic to NSAID or ASA)
ibuprofen
400 mg, PO, q6h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
TYLENOL #3 EQUIV tab PRN range dose
dose range: 1 to 2 tab, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
Select 1 opioid only (HYDROmorphone or morphine)
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.25 to 0.75 mg, PO q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 2 to 3 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, subcutaneous, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.1 to 0.4 mg, IV, q1h, PRN pain-breakthrough, drug form: inj
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 2.5 to 5 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 2.5 to 5 mg, subcutaneous, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, subcutaneous, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: inj
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 0.5 to 2 mg, IV, q1h, PRN pain-breakthrough, drug form: inj
metoclopramide PRN range dose
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, IV, q6h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
metoclopramide PRN range dose
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, PO, q6h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab
dimenhyDRINATE PRN range dose
dose range: 25 to 50 mg, IV, q4h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
dose range: 12.5 to 25 mg, IV, q4h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
dimenhyDRINATE PRN range dose
dose range: 25 to 50 mg, PO, q4h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab
dose range: 12.5 to 25 mg, PO, q4h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab
ondansetron PRN range dose
dose range: 4 to 8 mg, IV, q8h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
Select one HS sedation medication only
zopiclone
3.75 mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, order duration: 2 doses or times,  drug form: tab
melatonin sublingual
3 mg, sublingual, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab-sublingual
